Name: LoFi Hotel
About the game: Just play and chill LoFi Hotel is a comforting game about collecting cute guests and songs while enjoying Lofi music. Your hotel is a flying turtle, blessed with an oak tree on its shell waiting for you to explore a world of flying islands to rescue lost little animals. Music is the key! Collect dozens of different songs. They sound different depending on which musicians are in your party. Highlights Enjoy more than 60 minutes of original sound track composed exclusively for the game. Go through dozens of levels in beautiful 2D scenarios. Admire the charming hand-crafted animations. Gain gems to unlock rooms to get more and more guests Collect dozens of different cute guests. Enjoy hours of comforting and relaxing gameplay. Explore a world map to find new songs and guests in the sky islands
